Blog.post: well...it was decided that we would go to the theaters justa the three of us.....i know the othres wanted to see that movie on monday but i guess were watching a diff one because we already seen the "day after tomorrow"........i know ima get kicked in da ballz for this. *sniff*...allen......u know what that sniff is bout...so does alex.....
Check out this urlLink really cool thing I found! When you figure it out you'll feel stupid that you couldnt get it sooner! just click and watch!

WEll well wel.... if i remember correctly i was supposed to go to the movies during da week end but Allen Alex and i decided to go to tha movies today cause alex wasnt gonna be able to go tomorrow and im workin tomorrow. so right now im waitin' for the "others" to see if they are able to come.... were gonna go see it at like 10:20....lol...i thought it was a good idea. im out
k i got the hanga this...i think.......

yesterday was awesome! i got to go swimming at allens place that was prob the best part... almost drowned alex though...oops...allen started it... and allens parents made MEXICAN FOOD!..it was good... but the sucky part was that we were gonna go to th MOVIES that day and the day after but we kept on experiencing setbacks...maybe to day we'll go...

well i am kinda ok...going to school and all tomorrow the VERY last day ...and im fellin low cause somma the people that i really want to be there arent gonna be there...oh well...ill just go...incase...lol...jeez ima loser... well...i guess ill..just...

today i had a pretty miserable day.... first, i was in a crappy mood the whole day second, i had to go to tha hospital and get my balls felt by some guy named "Dr.Spector" third i had to go with my dad to and endless line of people in a room smaller than u office cubicle, which was about 2 degrees hotter than the sun...and the damn shit moved like 2 in. per hour.....not kool....and plus i have to study for some test in Bio...and uhhhh...play for third...(if she comes to school), and for 2nd....nada... man... not kool... well...ima go play mon guitar..PEACE!!!

today was a good day... i got to watch amovie in 3rd period and the teacher prob. died cause the school hasn't heard from her. anyway....after school i whent to my friends house and played games and....ate....good food....(farts)... and now i gotta do nothing....i guess ill sketch now... ------------INRI (Iesus Nazarenus Rex Iudaeorum) - Jesus of Nazareth, King of the Jews .....latin is so cool!
thcoo is almost over...and im glad...kinda...cause after that im gonna have to do stuff at home......not good
im feelin like a million bucks ever since...the event.....

well...(i just noticed i start all my scentences with "well") anyway....i seen Shrek 2 today....that movie almost made me pee my pants. That puss 'n boots was hilarious... and after we saw the movie we whent to go to get alex's book at B&N and i saw "Digital Fortress"....had to get it...but i needed a ATM machine so we walked around aimlessley untill i figured out what we were lookin' for...AN ATM! anyway when we got to one i decided i was hungry so we all took off to In & Out. I had my first 4X4 and it was GOOD... Alex had alot of stuff and he was silent for the rest of the time....i think hes gonna die of a heart attack at age 20. allen.....allen had a shake or somethin' After that...we whent to B&N to get my book and now i want to read it but i dont have time....well i do...but if i start im not gonna finish....and i dont like to but a book down after i have started to read it...and start like 5 days later... really cool day today

just got back from practice..and i feel like Mr.Hankey....exept that im not as perky....i feel like a plain piece of shit... i still have to fix up my web site fo da hicks. and i have to whip up an essay.... AND i have towork on a play for French class...too many presentations.....and after all this she wants me to go to Freanch 3!?i know im going but dont remind me....Id like to keep sanity as long as possible...which is not really long.
im workin on alotta thingies right now...mostly projects....

today was good. even though i woke up a little sore from the beach yesterday. me and a couple buddies whent to Zuma beach. it was lots of fun. the water was a bit on the chilled side, but i got used to it the second time i jumped in. the we buried allen and his head and lots of other things. twas an awesome day. today im just getting back from a trip that my sister made, it had a trillion stops.

today was very tiring. First of all i didnt get my necessary sleepage. and i got to school on time. had to jog a little. and then my drawing wasn't good enought for tha teach. however, my practice was SWELL! (i dont think ive ever used that word before). and from there i whent to allens where he made a forum for our highschool. urlLink check it out its pretty kool. anyway i left because i was falling asleep and the were gonna write on me. from there on my day was OK! ima make like a tree and lLEAF! aaaahahahahahaha(cheap joke of the day)

its been a while. well what to say, what to say. im realy tired and, umm, tired. but ive been playing my guitar and i came up with some kool tunes.(better than urs henry!) anyway. I believe that's all. peace out.
i feel a overwhelmingly titanic snowman stomping me with his jaded feet...repeatedly.

Today I walked all the way to a guitar shop and i bought a guitar string since my last one broke. I decided that I wanted to see a movie so I walked to blockbuster and payed an overdue fee.Oops. Then I got got the crappiest movie ever (whitch im not gonna talk about). After that was over I drew a pic of this awesome guy holding a staff of some sort. I whent to go play basketball afterwards and I hurt my retarded ankle. The pain was only temporary so im good. Tomorrow I have to go to school for a measily PE class. When you are arguing with a fool, make sure he isn't doing the same thing. -- Unknown

a couple dayz ago i watched The Way Of The Gun, it was a pretty good film. Although it got a rating of like 1.75 out of 5.I guess its just because i like the horribly bad gunfights woth the good actors. Plus it was the first movie in whitch i seen Taye Diggs act like a complete jackhole. i give it a 3.5 out of 5. anyway...i got to go pole vaulting today...loads of fun.I also acquired a huge nasty on my leg.sooner or later ill start playing with it. FEAR: F--FALSE E--EVIDENCE A--APPEARING R--REAL -- Veer Sharma

"Patience serves as a protection against wrongs as clothes do against cold. For if you put on more clothes as the cold increases, it will have no power to hurt you. So in like manner you must grow in patience when you meet with great wrongs, and they will then be powerless to vex your mind." -- Leonardo da Vinci (1452 - 1519)
They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel. - Carl W. Buechner
ive been reflecting on my life for a couple of days... Nostalgia and melncholly are now my choice of mood for the next few days as real life seeps back in.

woo hoo! i got to go driving around today... kool... i also watched a crapload of movies and stayed up all night watching them...anyway.. thats what update i have made to my life...so...there... i know its not the best story ever but WTH .

what to say, what to say? its been a while. i miss all my afterschool buddies. well its been pure work for me. everyday i get back home pooped, and to top it off im actually eating really healthy, which is good but i miss some of my favorite food. Anyway, as some of you may know my brother is sick and it really sucks because my dad is all depressed and that usually makes me depressed.But my sis leaves everywhere and i really want to go but my dad asks me not to go and i stay for his sake. other than that my life is just perky! :) (not) but ive improved on my guitar...woo hoo! and that would be the highlight of this whole blog. im gonna go and do absolutely nothing while my sis bathes in the sun at Zuma beach. *knocks himself out*
